text.content: mandy is fucking "crazy evil" shit. nic cage's pain is real, whether u see it or not. nic cage's character as red is not portrayed in detail enough in the first half of movie but u pay enough attention, u could see how he shows affection toward Mandy is very subtle in the way they talk, cuddle, tell story of traumatic childhood and comfort each other. and of course he loved her so much he went deranged in the second half. the transition between 2 half is very disturbing and painful. however it is all worth it and satisfying to see red going down on his revengeful path. andrea riseborough is beautifully creepy. i was captivated with her face's performance. the cult and biker gang are fucking disgusting and representation of how fucked up people could possibly going down (with the help of LSD shit or whatever). and of course the whole movie (or most of the runtime) is the closet experience on drug (idk what can even top this trip). not in the way of glorified it but make me horrified of them.
